text: Mass Central Rail Trail Wayside (Wayland, Weston), opened 2019
Silver Line SL3 to Chelsea, opened 2018

Worcester CR line, Boston Landing Station opened 2017
Cochituate Rail Trail, opened 2015, Upper Charles Rail Trail, opened 2015, Watertown Greenway, opened 2015
Boston to Border South (Danvers Rail Trail), opened 2012, Northern Strand Community Trail, opened 2012

Independence Greenway, opened 2008, Quequechan R. Bikeway, opened 2008
Depressed I-93 North and I-90 Connector, opened 2003

Minuteman Commuter Bikeway opened 1992, Narrow Gauge Rail Trail opened 1992
Dr. Paul Dudley White Bike Path, opened 1975, Shining Sea Bike Path, opened 1975
Massport takes control of Hanscom Field 1974
Interstate 90 (Allston–Downtown Boston), opened 1965, Interstate 95 (RI border–I-495–Rt. 128) opened Dec. 1965, Rt. 2 (Rt. 128–Alewife), opened 1965
Interstate 90 (Rt. 128–Allston), opened 1964, Interstate 93 (New Hampshire border–I-495), opened Nov. 1964
Central Artery, opened 1959, Southeast Expressway, opened 1959
Interstate 93 (Fort Hill–SE Expressway), opened 1958, Interstate 93 (SE Expressway–Rt. 3–Rt. 24–I-95), opened 1958, Rt. 24 (I-495–Rt. 128), opened 1958
Interstate 93 (Tobin Bridge–Fort Hill), opened 1954, Rt. 3 (I-495–Rt. 128), opened 1954

Red Line (Mattapan High Speed Line), opened Dec. 1929
